Ensure you have the right password typed in. If you do not remember your password, click on the 'reset your password' option at the bottom of your screen. This would prompt you to send an activation code to your email address that would allow you reset your password

How do I save someone's account information so that I do not have to type in their account number everytime I want to send thm money

You can save the person's or organization's account as a beneficiary.  You can do this by following the 'add to beneficiaries' prompt, that shows up after making a transaction to that person. It would allow you to save the account under a unique name of your choice that you can always bring up. You can also achieve this by clicking on the 'Beneficiary' tab on the homepage of your mobile app. While inside the tab click the 'Add Beneficiary' option at the bottom left of the screen, it would promp you to put in the account number and a unique name the account number should be saved as.
